cells.data:
Boxing
  • box diagramming technique (for css layout)
    • give visual spec of what the page would look like
    • Relative - absolute
      • 50% - 50px
      • 10rem - 10pt
        • rem is relative to html element’s text size
      • 3em - 3in
        • em is relation to body element’s text size
  • box model
    • Margin 
    • border
    • padding 
    • Content 
  • an element’s background is content and padding
